nodes.description: 两周前（2023年10月？） Mogadishu街头发生卡车炸弹袭击，造成350人死亡
nodes.support_text: Saturday’s blasts came two weeks after more than 350 people were killed in a massive truck bombing on a busy Mogadishu street in the country’s worst-ever attack.

nodes.description: 周六下午（同上） Al-Shabaab自杀式汽车炸弹袭击Nasa-Hablod酒店入口
nodes.support_text: Al-Shabaab, Africa’s deadliest Islamic extremist group, quickly claimed responsibility for Saturday’s attack and said its fighters were inside the hotel.

nodes.description: 周六夜间至周日清晨酒店遭武装分子冲击，23人死亡30人受伤
nodes.support_text: Footage from the scene showed twisted vehicles and nearby buildings with only walls left standing.

nodes.description: 周日早晨（具体时间）军警控制酒店，击毙3名武装分子并活捉2人
nodes.support_text: Capt. Mohamed Hussein said that troops regained control of the hotel on Sunday morning, having killed three attackers and captured two alive.

nodes.description: 周日清晨（同上）成功解救包括政府部长在内的30名人质
nodes.support_text: Police said security forces had rescued 30 people, including a government minister, from Mogadishu’s Nasa-Hablod hotel.

nodes.description: 袭击期间目击者确认武装分子使用伪造军服混入
nodes.support_text: He said he saw at least three armed men in military uniforms running toward the hotel after the suicide bombing at its gate.

nodes.description: 2020年底非洲联盟2.2万驻军计划撤离转交Somali军
nodes.support_text: A 22,000-strong multinational African Union force in Somalia is expected to withdraw its forces and hand over the country’s security to the Somali military by the end of 2020.

nodes.description: 2020年美国对Somalia实施近20次无人机打击
nodes.support_text: The US military also has stepped up efforts against al-Shabaab this year in Somalia, carrying out nearly 20 drone strikes as the global war on extremism moves deeper into the African continent.

nodes.description: 总统访问邻国寻求支持
nodes.support_text: Since the blast two weeks ago, president Mohamed Abdullahi Mohamed has visited other countries in the region to seek more support for the fight against the extremist group.

nodes.description: 总统宣布进入战争状态
nodes.support_text: The president declared a 'state of war' after the attack.
The president initiated efforts to unify regional powers within the fractured country.

nodes.description: 联邦政府确立自身地位
nodes.support_text: The federal government asserted its authority through diplomatic and military measures.

nodes.description: 全球反极端主义战争向非洲大陆深入
nodes.support_text: 全球反极端主义战争向非洲大陆深入

edges.support_text: Saturday’s blasts came two weeks after more than 350 people were killed in a massive truck bombing on a busy Mogadishu street in the country’s worst-ever attack.
Since the blast two weeks ago, president Mohamed Abdullahi Mohamed has visited other countries in the region to seek more support for the fight against the extremist group.
As night fell, sporadic gunfire could be heard as soldiers responded.
He said he saw at least three armed men in military uniforms running toward the hotel after the suicide bombing at its gate.
Capt. Mohamed Hussein said that troops regained control of the hotel on Sunday morning, having killed three attackers and captured two alive.
Police said security forces had rescued 30 people, including a government minister, from Mogadishu’s Nasa-Hablod hotel.
The US military also has stepped up efforts against al-Shabaab this year in Somalia, carrying out nearly 20 drone strikes as the global war on extremism moves deeper into the African continent.
2020年底非洲联盟2.2万驻军计划撤离转交Somali军
